Sentencas: Biogas produced at wastewater treatment plants and landfills is contaminated with siloxanes that impedes its use as fuel.
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina

Sentencas: Before being safe to use in solid oxide fuel cells or engines, siloxane contamination must be reduced to below 0.01 and 9.1 ppm (vol/vol) Si equivalent respectively.
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina

Sentencas: The literature has identified thermal decomposition in a packed bed of heated gamma alumina as a method that can remove siloxanes to the requisite levels Finocchio (2008) & Urban (2009).
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina

Sentencas: Missing from the literature is a kinetic study of the decomposition reaction where a theoretical model is fitted to experimental breakthrough curves so that breakthrough times can be predicted.
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina

Sentencas: The present work is this kinetic study.
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina

Sentencas: Experiments with synthetic biogas (0 to 100% methane and carbon dioxide mixtures) contaminated with octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane (D4) at concentrations between 32.3 and 72.7 ppm (vol/vol) Si equivalent were conducted.
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina

Sentencas: Beds of alumina were exposed to the gas at temperatures between 307 and 384 degrees C for contact times between 5.0 and 8.0 ms.
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina

Sentencas: The effluent D4 concentration was measured by GC-FID.
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina

Sentencas: The breakthrough curves obtained were fitted with a kinetic model that assumed a first order surface reaction, shrinking core particle kinetics, and plug flow in the reactor.
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina

Sentencas: For temperatures between 333 and 384 degrees C, the model fit the data well, most especially near the breakthrough point.
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina

Sentencas: Experimental conditions had no effect on quality of fit.
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina

Sentencas: At 307 degrees C, the model was inadequate; possibly due to D4 physisorption or shrinking core kinetics assumptions not holding true anymore.
Titulo: Kinetic study of the thermal decomposition of octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane on activated gamma alumina
